mapper.insert: INSERT INTO verify_ticket ( VERIFY_TICKET_ID, COMPONENT_VERIFY_TICKET, EXPIRES_IN, BEG_TIME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME)VALUES ( #{verifyTicketId}, #{componentVerifyTicket}, #{expiresIn}, #{begTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM verify_ticket ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,1
